Yes I have tried. But it installs tensorflow=1.3.

body:
Yes I have tried. But it installs tensorflow=1.3.

On Sep 7, 2017 1:16 AM, "Aabir Abubaker" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Have you tried
> conda install tensorflow?
> This is one of the best things about Anaconda - it simplifies package
> installation hugely.
>
